containerType.description:
Type of the container. The value of this property for: 1. Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines 2.
Classic Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines 3. Windows machines (like MAB, DPM etc) is
Windows 4. Azure SQL instance is AzureSqlContainer. 5. Storage containers is StorageContainer. 6. Azure workload
Backup is VMAppContainer

replicationPort.description: A value indicating the recovery HTTPS port.

lastRecoveryPoint.description: Timestamp when the last (latest) backup copy was created for this backup item.

policyId.description: ID of the backup policy with which this item is backed up.

sourceResourceId.description: ARM ID of the resource to be backed up.

workloadType.description: Type of workload this item represents.

backupManagementType.description: Type of backup management for the container.

healthStatus.description: Status of health of the container.

registrationStatus.description: Status of registration of the container with the Recovery Services Vault.

backupManagementType.description: Type of backup management for the backed up item.

itemId.description: ID of the item which is getting protected, In case of Azure Vm , it is ProtectedItemId

policyId.description: ID of the backup policy with which this item is backed up.

protectionState.description: Backup state of this backup item.

sourceResourceId.description: ARM ID of the resource to be backed up.

protectedItemsCount.description: Number of items associated with this policy.

certificate.description: The base64 encoded certificate raw data string

instanceType.description: Gets the type of action details (see RecoveryPlanActionDetailsTypes enum for possible values).
Gets the type of action details (see RecoveryPlanActionDetailsTypes enum for possible values).

id.description: The ARM Id of the recovery plan protected item.

instanceType.description: Gets the type of action details (see RecoveryPlanActionDetailsTypes enum for possible values).

count.description:
Count of duration types. Retention duration is obtained by the counting the duration type Count times.
For example, when Count = 3 and DurationType = Weeks, retention duration will be three weeks.

durationType.description: Retention duration type of retention policy.

isCompression.description:
Workload compression flag. This has been added so that 'isSqlCompression'
will be deprecated once clients upgrade to consider this flag.

timeZone.description: TimeZone optional input as string. For example: TimeZone = "Pacific Standard Time".

retentionDuration.description: Retention duration of the protection policy.

retentionPolicyType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

schedulePolicyType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorphic chain of types.

scheduleRunDays.description: List of days of week this schedule has to be run.

scheduleRunFrequency.description: Frequency of the schedule operation of this policy.

scheduleRunTimes.description: List of times of day this schedule has to be run.

scheduleWeeklyFrequency.description: At every number weeks this schedule has to be run.

targetStorageClassificationId.description: The ID of the storage object.

retentionPolicy.description: Retention policy with the details on backup copy retention ranges.

schedulePolicy.description: Backup schedule specified as part of backup policy.

encryption.description: Customer Managed Key details of the resource.

kekIdentity.description: The details of the identity used for CMK

keyVaultProperties.description: The properties of the Key Vault which hosts CMK

keyVaultId.description: The target key vault ARM Id.

serviceBusConnectionStringSecretName.description: The secret name of the service bus connection string.

storageAccountSasSecretName.description: The secret name of the storage account.

isOSDisk.description: A value indicating whether the disk is the OS disk.

logStorageAccountId.description: The log storage account ARM Id.

logStorageAccountSasSecretName.description: The key vault secret name of the log storage account.

dataMoverRunAsAccountId.description: The data mover run as account Id.

performAutoResync.description: A value indicating whether auto resync is to be done.

seedDiskTags.description: The tags for the seed disks.

snapshotRunAsAccountId.description: The snapshot run as account Id.

targetAvailabilitySetId.description: The target availability set ARM Id.

targetBootDiagnosticsStorageAccountId.description: The target boot diagnostics storage account ARM Id.

targetDiskTags.description: The tags for the target disks.

targetNicTags.description: The tags for the target NICs.

targetProximityPlacementGroupId.description: The target proximity placement group ARM Id.

targetResourceGroupId.description: The target resource group ARM Id.

vmwareMachineId.description: The ARM Id of the VM discovered in VMware.

appConsistentFrequencyInMinutes.description: The app consistent snapshot frequency (in minutes).

crashConsistentFrequencyInMinutes.description: The crash consistent snapshot frequency (in minutes).

recoveryPointHistoryInMinutes.description: The duration in minutes until which the recovery points need to be stored.

migrationSolutionId.description: The ARM Id of the migration solution.

physicalSiteId.description: The ARM Id of the physical site.

vmwareSiteId.description: The ARM Id of the VMware site.

daysOfTheWeek.description: List of days of the week.
List of days of week for weekly retention policy.

inquiryValidation.description: Inquiry validation such as permissions and other backup validations.

itemCount.description: Contains the protectable item Count inside this Container.

type.description: Type of the Workload such as SQL, Oracle etc.

monthsOfYear.description: List of months of year of yearly retention policy.

retentionScheduleDaily.description: Daily retention format for yearly retention policy.

retentionScheduleFormatType.description: Retention schedule format for yearly retention policy.

retentionScheduleWeekly.description: Weekly retention format for yearly retention policy.

properties.description: The properties of a configure alert request.
Input properties for creating network mapping.
The properties of an add provider request.
The properties of an add vCenter request.
